# Matt Robinson

> Digital strategy leader, AI practitioner, and writer. Managing Director of DBX at Bastion. Co-founded AnalogFolk Australia in 2011. Based in Sydney, Australia.

## About

Matt Robinson has spent 30 years navigating shifts in media and technology â€” the early web, social platforms, and now AI. He works at the intersection of AI, strategy, and culture.

- Managing Director, DBX at Bastion (2024-present)
- Co-founder, AnalogFolk Australia (2011-2024)
- Previously held senior strategy roles at Omnicom, WPP, and independent agencies
- Based in Sydney, Australia
- Website: https://mattrobinson.ai
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mattrobinson-au/

## Expertise

- Digital Strategy
- AI Strategy and Implementation
- Advertising and Brand Building
- Digital Transformation
- Marketing Technology
- Experience Design
- Creative Agency Leadership

## Writing

- [The Monks Who Finally Got to Think](/writing/the-monks-who-finally-got-to-think): How AI is eliminating cognitive drudgery and freeing people to do the work they signed up for. Explores Jevons Paradox applied to knowledge work.

## Notable

- Multiple Agency of the Year awards with AnalogFolk
- Gold APAC Effie Award
- Clients included Tourism Australia, Canon, Hyundai, Afterpay, Pernod Ricard
